meta.title: Calendar
meta.description: BootstrapVue custom calendar widget for selecting dates and controlling other components, fully WAI-ARIA accessible (a11y) and supports internationalization (i18n)

props.description: Initially selected date value. Accepts either a `YYYY-MM-DD` string or a `Date` object
Returns a `Date` object for the v-model instead of a `YYYY-MM-DD` string

When a `value` is not specified, sets the initial calendar month date that will be presented to the user. Accepts a value in `YYYY-MM-DD` format or a `Date` object. Defaults to the current date (or min or max if the current date is out of range)
Places the calendar in a non-interactive disabled state
Places the calendar in an interactive readonly state. Disables updating the v-model, while still allowing date navigation
Theme color variant to use for the selected date button
Theme color variant to use for highlighting todays date button. Defaults to the `variant` prop
Disabled the highlighting of todays date in the calendar
Day of week to start the calendar. `0` for Sunday, `1` for Monday, `6` for Saturday, etc.
Locale (or locales) for the calendar to use. When passing an array of locales, the order of the locales is from most preferred to least preferred
Set to the string 'rtl' or 'ltr' to explicitly force the calendar to render in right-to-left or left-ro-right (respectively) mode. Defaults to the resolved locale's directionality
The minimum date the calendar will show
The maximum date the calendar will show
Set to a function reference which returns `true` if the date is disabled, or `false` if the date should be enabled. See documentation for details
Set to a function reference which returns a class (string), or classes (array of strings) to apply to the date cell. See documentation for details
The width of the calendar. Has no effect if prop `block` is set
Makes the calendar full width
If the calendar controls another component/element, set this prop to the ID of the element the calendar controls
When set, visually hides the selected date header
Sets a value for the `role-description` attribute on the component
When set, renders a comment node instead of the calendar widget while keeping the Vue instance active. Mainly used when implementing a custom date picker
Value of the `aria-label` and `title` attributes on the `Previous Year` navigation button
Value of the `aria-label` and `title` attributes on the `Previous Month` navigation button
Value of the `aria-label` and `title` attributes on the `Current Month` navigation button
Value of the `aria-label` and `title` attributes on the `Next Month` navigation button
Value of the `aria-label` and `title` attributes on the `Next Year` navigation button
Value of the `aria-label` attribute set on the calendar grid date button that is selected
Value of the `aria-label` attribute for the calendar grid date button to signify that the date is today's date
Label to use when no date is currently selected
Value of the `aria-label` and `role-description` attributes applied to the calendar grid
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on to the calendar navigation button wrapper
Help text that appears at the bottom of the calendar grid
Format object for displayed text string that is passed to `Intl.DateTimeFormat`

events.description: Emitted to when updating the v-model

args.description: Either a string in the format of `YYYY-MM-DD` or a `Date` object (if `value-as-date` prop is `true`)

events.description: Emitted to when user has selected (clicked) a date. Note this event will also be emitted if the user clicks on the currently selected date

args.description: The selected date as a string in the format of `YYYY-MM-DD`
The selected date as a `Date` object

events.description: Emitted to when when the user changes the active date via date navigation buttons or cursor control

args.description: The context object. See documentaion for details

slots.name: default
slots.description: Used to place custom controls at the bottom of the calendar component
